JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description   Work in an environment where in development is not writing code but,  to ensure there is a value delivered and customer is happy   Encouraging environment for innovation for building a better product   Enhance your process understanding working in Scrum/Kanban    What we need in you:    Great Attitude,  Good communication,  and hunger to learn   Good working knowledge on AGILE methodology (ScrumKANBAN) and process   Knowledge of SDLC and Software Engineering concepts   Good Knowledge in JIRA Confluence   Exceptional problem solving skills and excellent skills in .NET technologies (esp. C# v.5.x,  xunit),  XML,  HTML,  and SQL server   Thorough understanding of SOLID architecture principles,  dependency injection,  MVC and MVVM   Good communication skills to work with team across geographies and other departments   Team player
